patthana20.8:4.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.8:5.1: Nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:5.2: Nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:5.3: Nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.8:6.1: Nadassanena pahātabbañca nanadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.8:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana20.8:8.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:9.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana20.8:10.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:11.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.8:12.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:13.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.8:14.1: Nasavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:14.2: Nasavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:14.3: Nasavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:15.2: Naavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:15.3: Naavitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.8:16.1: Nasavitakkañca naavitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:16.2: Nasavitakkañca naavitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:16.3: Nasavitakkañca naavitakkañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.8:17.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.8:18.1: Nasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:19.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.8:20.1: Nasappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:21.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.8:22.1: Napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:23.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.8:24.1: Nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:25.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.8:26.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:26.2: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:26.3: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.8:27.1: Nanaupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.8:28.1: Naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:28.2: Naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:28.3: Naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.8:29.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.8:30.1: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:30.2: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:30.3: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:33.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.8:34.1: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:35.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.8:36.1: Naarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:37.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke dve … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana20.8:38.1: Napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.8:39.1: Naapariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.8:40.1: Napariyāpannañca naapariyāpannañca dhammaṃ paṭicca pariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.8:41.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana20.8:42.1: Naniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.8:43.1: Naaniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.8:44.1: Naniyyānikañca naaniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.8:45.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana20.8:46.1: Naniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.8:47.1: Naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.8:48.1: Naniyatañca naaniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.8:49.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana20.8:50.1: Nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:50.2: Nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.8:50.3: Nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sauttaro ca anuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana20.8:53.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
